CategoryList.Contents: Nestle MilkyBar chocolate is a melt-in-the-mouth, scrumptions treat for all the chocolate lovers. An all time favourite, it offers a delectable and irresistible taste with every bite and leaves one asking for more.

Cadbury Dairy Milk is a brand of milk chocolate currently manufactured by Cadbury, except in the United States where it is made by The Hershey Company. It was introduced in the United Kingdom in 1905 and now consists of a number of products. Every product in the Dairy Milk line is made with exclusively milk chocolate.
